summary: REQ-22 is a deploy/publish task to IC mainnet with verification. The diff primarily changes frontend UI/theme/content structure and adds/updates deployment documentation, but it does not provide evidence of an actual mainnet deployment being performed (which is typically outside repo diffs). Multiple changes appear to violate the constraint/non-goals by modifying frontend functionality/appearance beyond whatâ€™s required for deployment.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish the current draft version of the MR Enterprises marketing website to the live/public Internet Computer environment by following the documented deployment steps in frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md (build production bundle, deploy to IC mainnet, and verify the live site).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains documentation updates and substantial frontend changes, but no evidence of the actual deployment execution (e.g., mainnet deploy outputs, canister IDs, CI/release config, or artifacts) or verification results. These acceptance criteria are mostly runtime/manual checks not demonstrable from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Major visual/theme overhaul (warm neutral palette, new typography, shadows, animations) not required for a publish/deploy-only change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains changes to deployment only and lists non-goals including no branding/theme/layout/SEO changes as part of publish step.

hallucinated_features.description: SEO/Open Graph metadata updates and favicon/logo asset link changes in the HTML entry point.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal includes changing SEO metadata and branding as part of this publish step.

hallucinated_features.description: Single-page layout restructuring and section changes (Gallery repositioning, About section removed from App composition; multiple section components condensed/changed).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal includes changing existing page content/copy/layout; constraint says do not modify frontend functionality beyond what is required to complete deployment.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded gallery functionality (16 images, category filtering UI, modal/lightbox behavior details).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-22 (deploy/publish). Represents new/changed frontend functionality beyond deployment needs.

hallucinated_features.description: Header/Footer behavior changes including new CTA behavior and attribution with UTM tracking.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested for deployment; also constitutes content/link changes beyond deployment scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Authentication gating removal (InternetIdentityProvider removed) and addition of QueryClientProvider in app bootstrap.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-22 requires the live site load without auth, but the BuildRequest constraint says avoid modifying functionality beyond deployment; this is a substantive app wiring change and is not clearly shown as strictly deployment-required in the diff summary alone.

hallucinated_features.description: New centralized contact configuration module used across the site.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested for deployment; adds/changes internal configuration structure.

hallucinated_features.description: Deployment guide significantly expanded with checklist/troubleshooting beyond simply following existing documented steps.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-22 says follow documented deployment steps; adding a comprehensive new/expanded deployment document is not explicitly requested (though related).
